TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MatrixTransform3D extends System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D
Public NotInheritable Class MatrixTransform3D Inherits Transform3D

Docs.summary: Creates a transformation specified by a , used to manipulate objects or coordinate systems in 3-D world space.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Utilizzare la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D> classe per creare trasformazioni personalizzate non disponibili per il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D> (classe).
È possibile combinare <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D> oggetti usando il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup> classe.
## Examples [!code-csharp[matrixtransform3dview#MatrixTransform3DView3DN1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixTransform3DView/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#matrixtransform3dview3dn1)] [!code-vb[matrixtransform3dview#MatrixTransform3DView3DN1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixTransform3DView/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#matrixtransform3dview3dn1)]

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this , and makes deep copies of this object's values. When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (although they might no longer resolve) but does not copy animations or their current values.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's property will be even if the source's property was .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Questo metodo viene utilizzato per produrre copie modificabili di bloccato <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetti o di qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetto. Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.
Per altre informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D CloneCurrentValue() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this object, and makes deep copies of this object's current values. Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's property will be even if the source's property was .

remarks.format:

Per altre informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

Public Shared ReadOnly MatrixProperty As DependencyProperty
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Value As Matrix3D
public: virtual property System::Windows::Media::Media3D::Matrix3D Value { System::Windows::Media::Media3D::Matrix3D get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a matrix representation of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] transformation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Value%2A> proprietà eredita il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D> classe. Il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Value%2A> proprietà consente di convertire qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D> oggetto in un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D> oggetto. Poiché il <xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform> classe è definita tramite una Matrix3D, il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Matrix%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Value%2A> restituiscono sempre lo stesso valore. La classe espone MatrixTransform3D il <xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix%2A> proprietà per abilitare l'accesso in scrittura.
## Examples [!code-csharp[matrixtransform3dview#MatrixTransform3DView3DN13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixTransform3DView/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#matrixtransform3dview3dn13)] [!code-vb[matrixtransform3dview#MatrixTransform3DView3DN13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixTransform3DView/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#matrixtransform3dview3dn13)]
